text: Don Edwards (March 20, 1939 â€“ October 23, 2022) was an American singer and guitarist. He performed Western music. Edwards recorded several albums, two of which, Saddle Songs and Songs of the Cowboy, are included in the Folklore Archives of the Library of Congress.Don Edwards Music Edwards also performs the song "Coyotes" that plays during the final minutes of the documentary Grizzly Man. In 2005, Edwards was inducted into the Western Music Association Hall of Fame.
